com.github.dbadia.sqrl.server.util

Class SqrlUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dbadia.sqrl.server.util.SqrlUtil

  • public class SqrlUtil
extends Object
    Various utility methods used by the rest of the SQRL code, including base64URL
    Author:
    Dave Badia

      • base64UrlDecodeToString

        public static String base64UrlDecodeToString(String toDecode)
                                      throws SqrlException
        Performs the SQRL required base64URL decoding
        Parameters:
        toDecodeParam - the data to be decoded
        Returns:
        the decoded data as a string using the UTF-8 character set
        Throws:
        SqrlException - if UTF8 is not supported

      • verifyED25519

        public static boolean verifyED25519(byte[] signatureFromMessage,
                                    byte[] messageBytes,
                                    byte[] publicKeyBytes)
                             throws SqrlException
        Internal use only. Verifies the ED25519 signature
        Parameters:
        signatureFromMessage - the signature data
        messageBytes - the message that was signed
        publicKeyBytes - the public key to be used for verification
        Returns:
        true if verification was successful
        Throws:
        SqrlException - if an error occurs during ED25519 operations

        Returns:
        true if blank, false otherwise
